affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
RADIUS: 200
SHARD DAMAGE: 70 / 140 / 210 / 280
SHARD DURATION: 5
cmb:
MANA COST: 120/120/120/120
COOLDOWN: 18/16/14/12
desc: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. If the ball reaches its maximum range the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 7 seconds.
notes:
The maximum distance is 1800.
Creates an impassable barrier.
lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
name: tusk_ice_shards

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 80 / 180 / 160 / 200
BONUS DAMAGE PER ALLY: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
BONUS SPEED PER ALLY: 100
STUN DURATION: 0.5 / 0.75 / 1 / 1.25
GATHER RADIUS: 100
LAUNCH TIME: 4
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 21 / 20 / 19 / 18
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball, automatically gathering allied Heroes within a 100 radius. Allies within a 400 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its speed and damage.
notes:
The snowball destroys trees.
The snowball travels at 150% of Tusk's movement speed.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed. Allies can click in the snowball to jump into it
lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
name: tusk_snowball

attrib:
RADIUS: 600
DURATION: 30
MOVEMENT SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
ATTACK SLOW: 30% / 40% / 50% / 60%
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 50
desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
notes:
If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.
The Sigil flies, has a 310 MS, 220/240/260/280 HP, 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.
name: tusk_frozen_sigil

attrib:
BUFF DURATION: 10
CRIT MULTIPLIER: 350%
THRESHOLD CRIT MULTIPLIER: 400%
AIR TIME: 1
SLOW DURATION: 2 / 3 / 4
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/75/100
COOLDOWN: 20/16/12
desc: Tusk prepares his mighty Walrus Punch; his next attack will do a critical strike and launch the victim into the air. The victim will be slowed upon landing and take damage.  More damage is dealt if the target is below a certain percentage of HP.
notes:
Walrus Punch cannot miss.
Disable works on magic immune units.
lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
name: tusk_walrus_punch
